definition: close one's eyes in death and die contentedly
to close (the eyes)
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
dead but will not close the eyes (idiom); to die with a remaining grievance

sentences.english: Mary is going to die,but she will not close her eyes until she knows her book is published.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽准备走了，但先要目睹她那本书出版后才瞑目。

sentences.english: Do not forget those who have been wrongfully accused by the Republic and died refusing to close their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记那些被共和国诬蔑而死不瞑目的人们。

sentences.english: Mary was ready to go, but first she wanted her book to be in print.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽准备走了，但先要目睹她那本书出版后才瞑目。

sentences.english: It is an interpretation of executive power that would make the Founders whirl in their graves.
sentences.chinese: 这一关于行政权力的解释会让开国先贤们死不瞑目。

sentences.english: It is a death with open eyes.
The aftermath lay right in front of him, staring with open eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她的遗体就躺在他前面，死不瞑目。

sentences.english: So I guess you could say the film made sure I will die unsatisfied.
sentences.chinese: 所以我猜你可以说这部电影必将令我死不瞑目。
